'''1.21.9 Release Candidate 1''' (known as '''1.21.9-rc1''' in the [[launcher]]) is the first and only [[release candidate]] for [[Java Edition 1.21.9]], released on September 25, 2025.<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-21-9-release-candidate-1|Minecraft 1.21.9 Release Candidate 1|September 25, 2025}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MC|fixedin=1.21.9 Release Candidate 1
|;dev
|302243|Creakings can spawn with the <code>spawnMonsters</code> game rule set to false.
|;prev
|302278|The texture in the middle of conduits is upside down.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* This version has the same protocol version number as [[25w41a]]. The two versions are not actually compatible; 1.21.9-rc1 throws a "Network Protocol Error" message when attempting to join a 25w41a world, and 25w41a crashes when attempting to join a 1.21.9-rc1 world.
